content:
Some internationally renowned comic book conventions in Canada, Australia, and Japan are:

Canada:
- Fan Expo Canada (Toronto)
- Montreal Comiccon
- Calgary Expo
- Vancouver Comic Arts Festival

Australia:
- Supanova Comic-Con & Gaming Expo (Melbourne, Sydney, Perth, Brisbane, Adelaide, Gold Coast)
- Oz Comic-Con (Sydney, Brisbane, Melbourne)
- Armageddon Expo (Melbourne, Auckland)

Japan:
- Comiket (Tokyo)
- Tokyo Comic-Con
- Anime Expo Japan (Chiba)
- Wonder Festival (Tokyo)
